name: Pennie Quaile-Pearce
who_you_serve: Individuals interested in self-development, personal growth, and breaking through limiting behaviors, particularly those who are committed to making significant life changes.
what_you_do: Ignite offers a comprehensive training course in energy medicine, focusing on self-development and personal transformation over a 10-day period.
